course_title: PMHNP Clinical Practice II: Advanced Psychiatric Care Across the Lifespan
course_description: This clinical practicum expands the student's ability to apply concepts, theories, and principles to complex groups. Focus is on skills acquisition in implementing evidence-based practice interventions, caseload management, and analyzing process dynamics with individuals, families, and groups.
prerequisites: NRSG 775D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4211, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: C. Nicholson, Status: Closed
